pages.text: Allows for quick building of miners and structures.$(br2)Shift right click to change mode.$(br2)Uses items from the inventory, for best results only have one type of frame in your inventory.

pages.title: Miner Frame
pages.text: $(br2)Places the frame for the miners and fluid absorbers.$(br2)Fluid absorbers use tier 5 frames.$(br2)Requires 36 frames

pages.title: Tree Absorber Frame
pages.text: $(br2)Places the frame for the tree absorber.$(br2)Tree absorbers use tier 1 frames.$(br2)Requires 64 frames

pages.title: Tree Absorber Tree
pages.text: $(br2)Places the tree needed for the tree absorber.$(br2)Can only be used on a dirt like block with a tree absorber placed underneath.$(br2)Requires 4 logs and 30 leaves of the same type.
